placeholderImages.description: A beautiful, warm illustration of a comfortable armchair next to a window, with a stack of books and a cup of coffee.
A clean, top-down view of a minimalist wooden desk with a laptop, a notebook, and a small plant.
A soft, ambient blend of pastel colors creating a calming and minimal backdrop.
A vibrant and modern university campus library.

A desktop background with an aesthetic cozy study theme, featuring an open book under warm ambient light with a glowing spot above it for a logo. A steaming coffee cup sits on the right, with soft shadows and gentle sparkles rising from the book. The scene uses warm beige, cream, and wooden tones, creating a minimal and calming effect with clean space in the center.

A soft, minimalistic, aesthetic study-desk background with a blurred depth-of-field effect. Include subtle elements like a pair of glasses, a warm latte art coffee cup, faint notebooks, and gentle shadows. Use cool grey and soft beige tones with a smooth gradient. The objects should be lightly out-of-focus to avoid distracting the UI content. The overall mood should feel calm, modern, and professional â€” perfect for a productivity app welcome screen.

A seamless, full-app background illustration with a warm, cozy, aesthetic study theme. Shows an open book, a warm coffee cup, and minimal desk elements. Uses a clean, flat-illustration style with warm beige, cream, and light brown tones.
A cozy desk setup with an open book, a cup of tea, and some plant decorations, creating a warm and inviting study atmosphere.
Abstract background with blue and purple gradients and geometric shapes.
A blurred, cozy workspace background with a cup of coffee, eyeglasses, and a notebook on a table. The colors are cool grey and soft brown, creating a clean and professional look.
